Articles.Content: So are there any ideas for possible cargos to fit into these containers? Perhaps the refit module for NovaSilisko's wet workshops could fit into one (or several) of these.
Or parts/metal/ore from Extraplanetary Launchpads Flying regular resupply missions would be fun.
Or alternatively, just use the modular fuel tanks mod to avoid duplicates entirely.
But that's not even close to what we are talking about here. Read the thread(s).

The first thing I come up with is a modular KAS winch. Then you'd have a radial mount winch that not only fits perfectly (and prettily) into any size of rocket but can also be moved around from one craft to another as the situation dictates.
nothke, how close are you to a working setup? I'm thinking about making a restockable parts warehouse module using your system and my FusTek-style aesthetics.
I'd also be interested in trying to fit the modules into Tek Sample Collection.

So are there any ideas for possible cargos to fit into these containers? Perhaps the refit module for NovaSilisko's wet workshops could fit into one (or several) of these.

yeah, having to place things like the fuel release ducts, the windows, ect (possibly life support equipment or a set of solar pannels or heck even batteries) would be cool too.
I'd be interested in using this system as is for my role-playing in KSP. Any chance of posting a dev build for us to play with?

This looks great! I'm subbed!

I like the idea of modular racks that can easily be swapped out during an EVA, maybe building a 'cargo port' in orbit for missions leaving LKO.

This is awesome. As someone who regularly runs "Supply missions" to his stations and bases this is exactly the kind of thing I'd love to have. Instead of just dropping off a full fuel tank and calling it "Supplies" now my OCD can actually have my kerbals yanking out crates of supplies, gear, and experiments. When this is ready to go I'm downloading immediately.
Wow, you managed to make it aesthetically pleasing and practical... Bravo! I'd like to see what our awesome modding community can do with this.
looks good. will there be a KAS winch storage container and maybe one for the hooks themselves?
So is there anything new on this front?
I'd love to see this one picked back up again. Maybe contact the guy who does the Thunder Aerospace mods. This would be perfect for his life support mod!
What about taking a look at the functionality of KAS attachment nodes instead of simply surface attaching your racks?

I thought the developer of this was making their own life support mod or something like that. Then again, it's been a while so who knows.

Either way, I'd also really like to see this integrated into TAC life support. Then, using KAS and infernal robotics, building things in space or on other planets will be so engaging

Sorry guys, I've been AFK for a month. It's the first moment I see a computer with connection now, and first thing I do is check KSP progress xD I see 0.21 is out and can't wait to get home and continue developing the racks and dromoman. I've got a full head of ideas too =) see you soon when I'm home.

- Greetings from Lyon airport, Nothke

Well, that's exciting news

Can't wait to see what you've got percolating in that brain of yours~

I cant imagine being away from a computer for a month..... <shiver>

welcome back!

He lives!

I look forward to seeing more progress
This looks awesome. Cannot wait to see it more complete.

Another vote to please keep working on this.

On a ridiculous side note, until issues of repacking into the delivery rack are resolved, how about incorporating a tiny remotely triggered solid engine to kick the "used" containers away from the ship? (Not for the space junk OCD, I know)

... So I just looked thru the imagr album and saw the one rack is laundry. And here I thought we'd be able to launch rocks into space!

Edited August 13, 2013 by CatastrophicFailure
Hurray! one of the most promising mods goes on!
Welcome back Nothke We were getting antsy here.
